Def.Name: Flowering Cherries/Apricots/Plums
Def.Leaves: May be double or single toothed margings.
Def.Twigs: May smell like bitter almond when broken or chrushed. May also have stuby/thornlike shoots.
Def.SeedConeOrFruit: Fruit: Drupe, may be juicy inside; with one large stone (pit).
Def.Bark: Level lenticels (lines), smooth or scaly. May peel in vertical stips.
Def.Remarks: Some produce double flowers with 2 rings of petals not 1.
